name: Pelé
desc: The king of football. Three World Cups and more than 1000 goals.

name: Diego Maradona
desc: Hand of God, Goal of the Century. Pure magic and madness.

name: Lionel Messi
desc: Smallest GOAT, master magician, Ballon d'Or and World Cup winner.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
desc: Goal machine, athletic beast, winner everywhere.

name: Johan Cruyff
desc: Total Football father, brilliant in style and mind.

name: Zinedine Zidane
desc: The bald maestro. 1998 Ballon d'Or and World Cup champion.

name: Ronaldinho
desc: Joyful magician who played with a constant smile. Ballon d'Or winner.

name: Ronaldo Nazário
desc: El Fenomeno. Blistering pace, genius finishing.

name: Franz Beckenbauer
desc: Der Kaiser. Invented the sweeper role and captained Germany to World Cup glory.

name: Lev Yashin
desc: The Black Spider. Only goalkeeper to win the Ballon d'Or.

name: Garrincha
desc: Dribble king. Inspired Brazil's 1958 and 1962 World Cups.

name: George Best
desc: United's rockstar winger. Genius with the ball, legend off the pitch.

name: Paolo Maldini
desc: Mr. AC Milan. Defensive perfection for 25 years.

name: Roberto Baggio
desc: The Divine Ponytail. Dazzled Italy; heartbreak in 1994.

name: Andrés Iniesta
desc: World Cup winning scorer, Barcelona legend, pass and move master.

name: Xavi
desc: Metronome of tiki-taka and Spain's golden generation.

name: Michel Platini
desc: French playmaker, Euro '84 hero.

name: Thierry Henry
desc: Arsenal icon, whippet fast, elegant finishing.

name: David Beckham
desc: Fashion icon and deadly crosser of the ball.

name: Roberto Carlos
desc: Legendary left back. Bullet free kicks.

name: Gianluigi Buffon
desc: Ironman, World Cup-winning legendary Italian goalkeeper.

name: Alfredo Di Stéfano
desc: Real Madrid's symbol. Won five straight European Cups.

name: Ferenc Puskás
desc: The Galloping Major. Hungarian goalscoring legend.

name: Eusébio
desc: The Black Panther. Benfica and Portugal great.

name: Marco van Basten
desc: Dutch striker, famed for his Euro '88 volley.

name: Ruud Gullit
desc: Versatile Dutch leader with iconic dreads.

name: Eric Cantona
desc: The King of Old Trafford, drama guaranteed.

name: Samuel Eto'o
desc: Africa's most decorated striker, scored everywhere.

name: Kaká
desc: Ballon d'Or, Champions League, World Cup, true gent.

name: Andriy Shevchenko
desc: AC Milan's Ukrainian goal machine.
